API_Description: Sets the review folder for multiple document reviews based on the specified category and document IDs.
API_Description_Reason: The method name suggests it is used to set a review folder for multiple reviews, and the parameters indicate it involves categories and document IDs.
Returns: A boolean indicating success or failure of setting the review folder.
Returns_Reason: Typically, methods that perform a set operation return a boolean to indicate whether the operation was successful.

cCategory.description: The category under which the reviews are organized.
cCategory.description_reason: The parameter name 'cCategory' implies it is used to specify a category for the reviews.
cCategory.type_reason: The 'c' prefix and the context suggest it is a string representing a category name.

oDocIDs.description: An array of document IDs for which the review folder is being set.
oDocIDs.description_reason: The parameter name 'oDocIDs' suggests it is a collection of document identifiers.
oDocIDs.type_reason: The 'o' prefix and the context imply it is an array, likely containing document IDs.

cFolder.description: The path or identifier of the folder to set for the reviews.
cFolder.description_reason: The parameter name 'cFolder' indicates it specifies the folder location or identifier.
cFolder.type_reason: The 'c' prefix and the context suggest it is a string representing a folder path or identifier.
